post.body: I know we have talked... just got to see you in person again. We'll have to stay in touch!
Ha... small world we interviewed Noel in New Orleans during Essence... was the show ur sis did at the W?
I don't know about NABFME.. I haven't gotten any emails on anything. Charlondra Glover who I worked w/ moved back to Dallas
I'm a fan of Noel Gourdin too... he's a down to earth guy.
What? IPhones $99 @ Walmart. wow, thanks for the info.. http://tinyurl.com/5zldwu
kayaking.. really Dewayne & you wonder why I gave you a hard time about going to Bahamas for "work"... cause it ain't ;-)
Thanks!:-) You're right.
and FYI... Yes I'm hating! :-) Have fun... tell Brian be good too! Holla!
I'll just be here in Houston w/ this 35 degree weather today, while you're chilling (oh I mean working) in the Bahamas.
Damn, poor guy! u have to go to the Bahamas. I'm so sorry. Quit whinin about being up early! Lucky butt! Have fun for me!
Where are you headed this lovely Friday morning?
Ok... now I'm going to check it out... we drove by one day & said it looks like the food should be good!
I've passed by there... how's the food?
I hope MY tomorrow is like YOUR today! You have been having a good one all day! Today has been so blah for me...
We have to officially meet! We are too close and cross so many of the same paths.
OMG... wait a minute... that's ur sis!!! Ha...I didn't even put it together... it's such a small world! Doris is soooo sweet. Good people!
I wonder if Walmart will really sell IPhones and for that price...
good morning everyone... getting ready for church! St. Mary's Catholic Church in 3rd Ward (Houston).
Sometimes I simply have to pray for understanding... and if I can't get an understanding then patience... it will come! I hope!
Remember it's World AIDS Day today...
